name: Feature Requests
description: Suggest new features and enhancements for the product. Help us understand what functionality would make your experience better.

name: Bug Reports
description: Report bugs, issues, or unexpected behavior you've encountered. Include detailed steps to reproduce the problem.

name: UI/UX Improvements
description: Share your thoughts on user interface and experience improvements. Help us make the product more intuitive and user-friendly.

name: Mobile App
description: Feedback and suggestions specifically for our mobile application. Share your mobile user experience and ideas for improvement.

name: Integration Requests
description: Request integrations with third-party services and tools. Let us know what platforms and services you'd like us to connect with.

name: Beta Testing
description: Private board for beta testers to provide feedback on experimental features and upcoming releases.
